content.question: The use of deep relief carving in the Pyxis of al-Mughira affects the composition in which of the following ways?

choices.label: It highlights the large amount of negative space.
It reduces the sense of depth behind the imagery.
It emphasizes the volume of the figures, decorative motifs, and text.
It minimizes contrast in tone, light, and shadow.

content.answer: It emphasizes the volume of the figures, decorative motifs, and text.

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
